title: Hmmm
review:
Based on real events in a small town where the pastor takes advantage of his female flock.

Not sure if it's really based on a true story.

The movie is interesting and maybe worth a look see.

Some preacher goes around savagely beating to death people from time to time in different places.

I was never really sure why, nor is any of the violence especially graphic. This last part is what makes it interesting. The filmmakers appear to have been trying to make a serious movie with a low budget. The acting is good.

After a while, however, it grows a bit tedious. Try it out. See if you like it.
